p: Before initiating the search process, coauthors A.M.K. and S.M.W. consulted with a librarian at Simon Fraser University to gather input on search strategy and keywords. Sources were collected from PubMed, Web of Science, PsycINFO, Environmental Complete, Sociological Abstracts, and Global Health databases, using relevant search terms (see Figure 1 for keyword searches). Although this number of databases would give multiple duplicates, it improved rigor by ensuring researchers found more articles on the topic.
